product_metadata.base_plan: Bajaj Life eTouch II – Life Shield Variant

product_summary.objective: Provides comprehensive protection to women against uncertainties like death and critical illness, with an optional child care income benefit.
key_highlights: Terminal illness benefit up to ₹2 Crores
Coverage against 60 critical illnesses including women-specific cancers
Optional child care rider with monthly income till child turns 25

core_benefits.details: Paid to the nominee in case of unfortunate death of the Life Assured.

core_benefits.notes: For more details, please refer to the sales brochure.

riders.rider_name: Bajaj Life New Critical Illness Benefit Rider – Comprehensive Variant
Bajaj Life Family Protect Rider – Child Care Variant

payout_rules.lump_sum: 105% of total rider premiums paid (excluding taxes)
payout_rules.income_calculation: 0.5% of Rider Sum Assured per month

health_management_services.notes: Service value based on estimated average market price.

sample_illustrations.name: Pallavi
sample_illustrations.scenario: Diagnosed with cancer, CI benefit paid

sample_illustrations.name: Meera
sample_illustrations.scenario: Death due to accident, nominee gets lump sum + child income

must_disclose: Insurance is subject to terms and conditions.
Please read the sales brochure and policy document carefully before purchase.
compliance_rules.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are applicable as per prevailing Section 80C and Section 10(10D) under the Income Tax Act (old regime). Consult your tax advisor.
compliance_rules.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fictitious/fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.

retrieval_chunks.text: Death Benefit provides a lump sum payout to the nominee in case of death of the life assured.
Terminal illness benefit offers lump sum payout up to ₹2 Crores upon diagnosis of terminal illness.
Critical Illness Rider covers 60 illnesses including women-specific cancers like breast and ovarian cancer.
Child Care Rider pays 105% of premiums plus monthly income until the child turns 25 years old.
Provides free health services worth ₹36,500/year including checkups, OPD consultation, emotional wellness, and nutritionist support.
